channel.title: Comments on: Speak, for the cup of hemlock is not yet on your lips
channel.description: জ্ঞান যেখানে সীমাবদ্ধ, যুক্তি যেখানে আড়ষ্ট, মুক্তি সেখানে অসম্ভব

item.title: By: sanvi
item.dc:creator: sanvi
item.description: Hi, i really like your videos. I need one information. There was a famous early convert to islam who became muslim because islam allows one to fight non muslim and he wanted to fight. Can you please tell me his name or provide me link/ reference.
item.content:encoded: Hi, i really like your videos. I need one information. There was a famous early convert to islam who became muslim because islam allows one to fight non muslim and he wanted to fight. Can you please tell me his name or provide me link/ reference.
